contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Villers-Bocage |image = Mairie, Villers-Bocage.JPG |caption = Town hall |image coat of arms = Blason ville fr Villers Bocage (Calvados).svg |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = [[Canton of Villers-Bocage, Calvados|Villers-Bocage]] |INSEE = 14752 |postal code = 14310 |mayor = Xavier Lebrun |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Villers-Bocage Intercom |longitude = -0.6553 |latitude = 49.0797 |elevation m = 170 |elevation min m = 95 |elevation max m = 217 |area km2 = 5.76 |population = 2963 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|Villers-Bocage (Calvados)|date=December 2008}} '''Villers-Bocage''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in Northern [[France]]. ==History== ===Second World War=== The [[Battle of Villers-Bocage]] was a significant battle between British and German forces on 13 June 1944 during the [[Operation Overlord|Battle of Normandy]]. Further fighting occurred two weeks later during [[Operation Epsom]], during which the village was destroyed by 250 RAF heavy bombers. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1793|1121 |1800|1010 |1806|1223 |1821|1177 |1831|1178 |1836|1178 |1841|1146 |1846|1134 |1851|1127 |1856|1105 |1861|1156 |1866|1155 |1872|1147 |1876|1139 |1881|1084 |1886|1147 |1891|1057 |1896|1104 |1901|1047 |1906|1073 |1911|1141 |1921|1039 |1926|1060 |1931|1093 |1936|1202 |1946|743 |1954|1431 |1962|1825 |1968|1985 |1975|2317 |1982|2623 |1990|2845 |1999|2904 |2008|2963 }} {{clear-left}} ==International relations== The commune is twinned with: * [[Bampton, Devon]], UK since 1974 ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.tourisme.fr/office-de-tourisme/villers-bocage.htm Website of the office of tourism] (in French) *[http://www.villers-bocage.info/ Information about Villers-Bocage] {{commonscat|Villers-Bocage (Calvados)}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Villersbocage}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
